wikipedia_page.main: Herbert Clarence Randle (31 July 1906 – 7 August 1976), known as Harry Randle, was an English footballer who played professionally for clubs including Southend United, Accrington Stanley and Gillingham, for whom he made 110 Football League appearances. Randle was born in Stonebroom and died in Chesterfield.

response: * Harry Randle (Herbert Clarence Randle), English footballer
